description:
Henry`s experiments with the unearthed Metal Battler attract the attention of both Remi and Mary J. Gordon. When Mary obtains pictures and threatens to go to Shadow with the evidence, she`ll quickly discover the true extent of Henry`s influence...
Source: Inka-Subs

titles.title: The Great Experiment: Weapons of Ambition
大実験! 野望の兵器
